page.title: 07COAL MINING TODAY
page.content: { { {TODAY'S MINES}ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM THOSE IN THE OLD DAYS.THEY ARE SAFER AND MORE MECHANISED.NEAR OUR SCHOOL THERE ARE THE FOLLOWING MINES; MANSFIELD(CROWN FARM),CLIPSTONE, SHERWOOD,RUFFORD(RAINWORTH),THORESBY (EDWINSTOWE),AND SUTTON.THE PART THAT RISES HIGH ABOVE THE GROUND IS THE WINDING GEAR.CLIPSTONE CLAIMS TO HAVE THE HIGHEST WINDING GEAR IN THE COUNTRY.EVERY PIT MUST HAVE AT LEAST 2 SHAFTS FOR THE CAGES TO GO UP AND DOWN,VENTILATION AND TO ALLOW COAL TO BE TRANSPORTED.FANS DRIVE FRESH AIR INTO THE DOWNCAST SHAFT AND MORE FANS DRAW THE STALE AIR UP THE TOP SHAFT.
